00044 /*! The identifier to identify a multi-data CHP file. */
00045 #define CHP_MULTI_DATA_TYPE "affymetrix-multi-data-type-analysis"
00046 
00047 /*! An enumerant to store the types of data stored in the file. */
00048 typedef enum MultiDataType { 
00049     ExpressionMultiDataType, 
00050     ExpressionControlMultiDataType, 
00051     GenotypeMultiDataType, 
00052     GenotypeControlMultiDataType, 
00053     CopyNumberMultiDataType, 
00054     CytoMultiDataType, 
00055     CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType,
00056     DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType,
00057     DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType,
00058     DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType,
00059     ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType,
00060     SegmentCNMultiDataType,
00061     SegmentLOHMultiDataType,
00062     SegmentCNNeutralLOHMultiDataType,
00063     SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType,
00064     SegmentMosaicismMultiDataType,
00065     SegmentNoCallMultiDataType,
00066     FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType,
00067     FamilialSamplesMultiDataType,
00068     SegmentGenotypeConcordanceMultiDataType,
00069     SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType,
00070     SegmentCNLossLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00071     SegmentCNNeutralLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00072     SegmentHeteroUPDMultiDataType,
00073     SegmentIsoUPDMultiDataType,
00074     SegmentDenovoCopyNumberMultiDataType,
00075     SegmentHemizygousParentOfOriginMultiDataType,
00076         AllelePeaksMultiDataType,
00077         MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType,
00078         CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType
00079 } MultiDataType_t;

00151 /*! Holds data set information. */
00152 class DataSetInfo
00153 {
00154 public:
00155         /*! The data type. */
00156         MultiDataType dataType;
00157 
00158         /*! chp data sets */
00159         DataSet* entries;
00160 
00161         /*! The maximum length of the name column. */
00162         int maxName;
00163 
00164     /*! The maximum length of the familial seg type column. */
00165     int maxSegmentType;
00166 
00167     /*! The maximum length of the familial ref seg id column. */
00168     int maxReferenceSegmentID;
00169 
00170     /*! The maximum length of the familial seg id column. */
00171     int maxFamilialSegmentID;
00172 
00173         /*! The maximum length of the familial sample ARR id */
00174         int maxFamilialARRID;
00175 
00176         /*! The maximum length of the familial sample CHP id */
00177         int maxFamilialCHPID;
00178 
00179         /*! The maximum length of the familial sample CHP file name */
00180         int maxFamilialCHPFile;
00181 
00182         /*! The maximum length of the familial sample role */
00183         int maxFamilialRole;
00184 
00185         /*! The data set index. */
00186         int dataSetIndex;
00187 
00188         /*! An array of extra metric columns. */
00189         std::vector<ColumnInfo> metricColumns;
00190 
00191         /*! constructor */
00192         DataSetInfo();
00193 };
